episode_summary: This episode features a look back at some of the most interesting facts from 2023, including NASA's asteroid mission, Silvio Berlusconi's unusual inheritance, a footballer's ironic initials, and crocodiles' unexpected reaction to helicopters.

facts.fact: After a journey of 60 million miles this year, NASA finally brought a fragment of an asteroid back to Earth in a special capsule. Unfortunately, they can't get into it because they don't have the right screwdriver.
The heirs who inherited Silvio Berlusconi's properties had to deal with the 20 bunga bunga showgirls still living in them.
England footballer Ivan Toney, who was suspended for gambling in May, has the middle names Benjamin Elijah, meaning his initials spell out I bet.
This year we discovered that crocodiles are horny for helicopters.
